channel.title: java.io.FileNotFoundException (unexplained)
channel.description:
[code]SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\configuration.cfg (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World.loadConfiguration(World.java:179) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World.init(World.java:167) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.<init>(RS2Server.java:49) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36)[/code]
throws this error, im trying to get hyperion to run through eclipse and though it seems simple its not because im look at the configuration.cfg file and it IS in the data folder, idk y its saying this.
